A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Load `gcamland` package
2. Run the following commands:
```
...
```
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen when you ran the commands.

A clear and concise description of what actually happened when you ran the commands.  Be sure to include any warnings or error messages that were produced.  You may have to use the `warnings()` function to get the text of the warnings.
